NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
February 9,1961
Mr. William G. Harley
President
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Last year the NAEB paid my expenses to the meeting of the NAEB Board
in Columbus. Skornia's attitude at that time was that the association
could pay for one Board meeting a year and the individual would have
to assume the responsibility for the second meeting. My inquiry is to
know if this policy still remains and that my expenses to the Columbus
meeting would be underwritten by the NAEB. It is necessary that I
understand this arrangement immediately in order to make the proper
arrangements to be away from my work.
Thank you for your attention in this matter.
Sincerely yours.
Raymond D. Humbert
Director, Region II
RDH/ml
